original_title: いつまた、君と ～何日君再来～
overview: Tomoko Ashimura types on a computer her memory of her late husband Goro, but Tomoko Ashimura succumbs to a disease. On behalf of Tomoko Ashimura, her grandchild Osamu collects Tomoko’s memoirs. He learns about the love between his grandparents for the past 50 years and the difficult life they faced during and after the Pacific War.
tagline: Itsu Mata, Kimi to Hori Jun Zairai
title: When Will You Return?
